inclusion.criterion: any aneurysmal SAH patients with radiographic evidence of hydrocephalus
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients received at the UCSD Medical Center with grade II, III, IV subarachnoid hemorrhage or patients with aneurysmal SAH with radiographic evidence
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: pregnant patients or minors of age <18
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: patients treated with lumbar drain, patients will have CSF drainage of 10cc/hour for lumbar drain while patients treated with EVD at 15cm above the tragus
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: patient has a large pericardial effusion and was found incidentally to have Burkitt's lymphoma
